requirement_tested: User registration and login functionality for students and training providers
user_persona: A new student named Alex who wants to register for the portal.
user_goal: Successfully register as a student and log into the portal.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Registration
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the homepage and sees the 'Register' button. He clicks it to begin signing up.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Register' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional registration fields such as name, confirm password, and role selection appear.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Registration Form
narrative_steps.description: Alex fills out his name, email, password, confirms the password, and selects 'Student' as his role.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in all required registration fields and select 'Student' from the role dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Submit' button becomes enabled after filling all fields correctly.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Registration
narrative_steps.description: Alex submits the form to create his account.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex receives a success message and is redirected to the login page.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Alex enters his registered email and password to log in.
narrative_steps.action: Enter email and password into the login form and click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is authenticated and redirected to the student dashboard.

requirement_tested: Profile management for students to input and update personal details, qualifications, and career preferences
user_persona: A student named Taylor who recently completed a course and wants to update her profile.
user_goal: Update her qualifications and career preferences in her profile.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile Management
narrative_steps.description: Taylor logs in and navigates to her profile section to make updates.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the profile management page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A form with editable fields for personal details, qualifications, and career preferences is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Qualifications
narrative_steps.description: Taylor adds her newly acquired certification under the qualifications section.
narrative_steps.action: Add new qualification data in the qualifications field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The field accepts the input and reflects the new qualification.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Changes
narrative_steps.description: After making changes, Taylor clicks 'Save Changes' to update her profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Changes' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A success confirmation message appears, indicating that the profile has been updated.

requirement_tested: Dashboard for students to view matched training programs and application status
user_persona: Jordan, a student exploring training opportunities.
user_goal: View matched training programs and check the status of his applications.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Matched Programs
narrative_steps.description: Jordan logs into the portal and lands on his dashboard where he sees a list of matched training programs.
narrative_steps.action: Load the student dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dashboard displays two panels: one with matched programs and another with application statuses.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Program Details
narrative_steps.description: Jordan hovers over one of the matched programs to see more information about it.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a program item in the matched programs panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears showing additional context like match score or deadlines.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Application Status
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on a program to view its detailed information and application status.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a program item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system navigates to the detailed view page of the selected program.

requirement_tested: Advanced matching algorithm to suggest training programs based on qualifications, location, field of study, and career interests
user_persona: Casey, a student who just updated her profile with new interests.
user_goal: See updated training program suggestions based on her latest profile changes.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Matching Algorithm
narrative_steps.description: After updating her career interests, Casey saves her profile which triggers the matching algorithm.
narrative_steps.action: Save updated profile information.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system automatically runs the matching algorithm in the background.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Updated Matches
narrative_steps.description: Casey refreshes her dashboard to see if there are new training program matches.
narrative_steps.action: Refresh the dashboard page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New or updated program matches reflecting her interests appear in the matched programs panel.

requirement_tested: Intuitive interface for students to apply to training programs directly through the portal
user_persona: Riley, a student interested in applying to a digital marketing course.
user_goal: Apply to a training program directly from the portal.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Application
narrative_steps.description: Riley finds a digital marketing course she likes and clicks the 'Apply Now' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply Now' button on the program listing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal window opens with the program details and a pre-filled application form.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Application
narrative_steps.description: Riley reviews the pre-filled information and submits her application.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Application' button in the modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Her application is recorded, and a confirmation message is displayed.

requirement_tested: Training provider dashboard to manage program listings and view matched student profiles
user_persona: A training provider named Morgan managing skill development programs.
user_goal: Create a new training program and view matched student profiles.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Program Listing
narrative_steps.description: Morgan logs in and navigates to the 'My Programs' tab, then clicks the '+' icon to add a new program.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '+' icon in the 'My Programs' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A popup form for creating a new program listing appears.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Program Details
narrative_steps.description: Morgan fills in the title, description, location, and field of study for the new program.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in all required fields in the new program form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields accept the input and the form is ready for submission.

narrative_steps.title: Saving New Program
narrative_steps.description: Morgan saves the new program listing.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The new program appears in the 'My Programs' list.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Matched Students
narrative_steps.description: Morgan switches to the 'Matched Students' tab to see potential applicants.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Matched Students' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of student profiles matching the provider's criteria is displayed.

requirement_tested: Ability for training providers to search and filter student profiles based on predefined criteria
user_persona: A training provider named Quinn looking for qualified students.
user_goal: Find students with specific qualifications using the filtering options.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Quinn uses the filter options to narrow down students by qualification level and study area.
narrative_steps.action: Select desired options in the qualification level and study area filters.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The student list dynamically updates to show only those matching the selected criteria.

narrative_steps.title: Resetting Filters
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing, Quinn resets the filters to see all students again.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Reset Filters' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All filter selections are cleared and the full list of students is restored.

requirement_tested: Secure messaging or communication system between students and training providers
user_persona: A student named Devon who wants to ask questions about a program.
user_goal: Send a message to a training provider through the portal.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Chat Interface
narrative_steps.description: Devon navigates to the messaging section and selects a training provider to communicate with.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a training provider's chat thread in the messaging sidebar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The conversation history with that provider loads in the main panel.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Message
narrative_steps.description: Devon types his question and sends it to the provider.
narrative_steps.action: Type a message in the input area and click the 'Send' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The message is sent instantly and appears in the conversation view for both parties.

requirement_tested: Data persistence using PostgreSQL with connection via specified environment variables
user_goal: Ensure the application persists data correctly using PostgreSQL.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: The admin checks that the backend service connects to PostgreSQL using the correct environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect backend logs for successful database connection messages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Logs indicate successful connection to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, and DB_NAME.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Data Storage
narrative_steps.description: The admin verifies that user registration data is stored in the database.
narrative_steps.action: Query the users table in PostgreSQL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Newly registered user data is present in the database.

requirement_tested: Frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_goal: Verify that the frontend correctly fetches dynamic data from backend APIs.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: The developer opens the student dashboard to verify data is fetched dynamically.
narrative_steps.action: Load the student dashboard page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard content such as matched programs and application status is loaded via API calls.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Network Requests
narrative_steps.description: The developer inspects network traffic to confirm API endpoints are called.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser DevTools and check Network tab for API requests.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: API requests to endpoints like /api/student/matched-programs are observed.

requirement_tested: Backend API layer that interfaces with PostgreSQL database for data storage and retrieval
user_persona: QA engineer validating backend API functionality.
user_goal: Ensure backend APIs properly interact with the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Testing API Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: The QA engineer sends a request to the profile update API endpoint.
narrative_steps.action: Send a PUT request to /api/profile/:userId with updated data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The API responds with a success status and the data is updated in the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Database Update
narrative_steps.description: The QA engineer checks the database to confirm the profile was updated.
narrative_steps.action: Query the user_profiles table for the updated record.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The record in the database reflects the changes made via the API.

requirement_tested: Role-based access control to differentiate student and training provider functionalities
user_persona: A user attempting to access restricted features.
user_goal: Verify that role-based access control prevents unauthorized access.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: A student tries to access the training provider dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the training provider dashboard URL while logged in as a student.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Access is denied and the student is redirected or shown an error message.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Authorized Features
narrative_steps.description: The same student accesses features allowed for their role.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the student dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The student dashboard loads successfully without restrictions.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with Azure-themed background and midnight blue UI controls
user_persona: End user browsing the portal on different devices.
user_goal: Experience a consistent and responsive interface across devices.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing on Desktop
narrative_steps.description: The user opens the portal on a desktop browser and observes the layout.
narrative_steps.action: Load the portal homepage on a desktop browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page displays with Azure background and Midnight Blue controls, laid out appropriately for desktop.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: The user resizes the browser or uses a mobile device to check responsiveness.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window or open portal on a mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts fluidly to smaller screens, maintaining readability and usability.

requirement_tested: Package.json configuration with 'install:all' script to install frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: Developer setting up the project for the first time.
user_goal: Install all project dependencies with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: The developer clones the repository and runs the install script.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all' in the project root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend are installed successfully.

requirement_tested: Package.json configuration with 'dev' script to start frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: Developer beginning work on the project.
user_goal: Start both frontend and backend development servers simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: The developer runs the dev script to launch both frontend and backend.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run dev' in the project root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend servers start concurrently, ready for development.
